message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

This paper deals with the synthesis and segmentation of medical images using deep learning techniques. The paper proposes a novel approach using a 3D convolutional neural network (CNN) with mutually-beneficial generators and segmentors for image synthesis and segmentation tasks. The paper also discusses the use of synthetic data for modalities with limited training samples. Based on these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are computer vision (cs.CV), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), multimedia (cs.MM), and neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
